thread.title: Duke defends wrong basket, gives up open layup to Louisville - Business Insider
thread.title_full: Duke defends wrong basket, gives up open layup to Louisville - Business Insider

author: Scott Davis
title: Duke defends wrong basket, gives up open layup to Louisville - Business Insider
text:
Duke's women's basketball team had one of the strangest and silliest lapses seen in sports on Monday night.
Early in the third quarter, with Louisville leading 25-23, Louisville duped Duke into defending the wrong basket by lining up in the back-court.
When Louisville inbounded the ball, three of their own players and all five of Duke's players were waiting in the back-court. They tossed in the ball and got a wide open layup, as the entire Duke defense was fooled into defending the wrong basket.
Whoops.
Via ESPN
Even the announcers seemed confused after the fact. After a brief pause following the layup, the play-by-play announcer said, "And some confusion by the Blue Devils, defending the wrong end of the floor to begin the third quarter."
Not the ideal start to 2017 for Duke.
